channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- Triconex Tricon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- Triconex Tricon

item.title: CVE-2018-7522|2024-08-05T06:31:04.336Z -- schneider%20electric -- triconex%20tricon
item.description: In Schneider Electric Triconex Tricon MP model 3008 firmware versions 10.0-10.4, when a system call is made, registers are stored to a fixed memory location. Modifying the data in this location could allow attackers to gain supervisor-level access and control system states.

item.title: CVE-2018-8872|2024-08-05T07:10:46.217Z -- schneider%20electric -- triconex%20tricon
item.description: In Schneider Electric Triconex Tricon MP model 3008 firmware versions 10.0-10.4, system calls read directly from memory addresses within the control program area without any verification. Manipulating this data could allow attacker data to be copied anywhere within memory.
